pr_title: SAMZA-2585: Modify shutdown sequence to handle orphaned AMs

timeline.message: Modify shutdown sequence for orphaned AMs
Modify test for shutdown sequence for orphaned AMs

timeline.bodyText: why not leverage stop(SamzaAppStatus.FAILED) up top? I like some additional logs. so maybe modify the stop(...) to include this logs for better debuggability.
timeline.author: mynameborat

timeline.bodyText: Perhaps add cases for unregister throwing exceptions too.
timeline.author: mynameborat

timeline.bodyText: should we also verify if unregister is called? Since if we don't unregister, we will end up retrying and its important this code path doesn't get broken when someone modifies to use a different status to invoke lifecycle.onShutdown(...)
timeline.author: mynameborat

timeline.bodyText: nit: avoid * imports and import explicitly.
timeline.author: mynameborat
